nodes.bodyText: The description for the value is out of date -- doesn't match allowable values.
Do you want to expose this? It's showing up in the openapi/swagger doc.

I think I need to play around with this in a new PR.
In discussion with @garyluu, I think it can be tricky. For type-checking reasons I think we have to expose every possible language we support in the swagger.yaml/openapi.yaml.
We can display dynamically at endpoints like https://dockstore.org/api/metadata/descriptorLanguageList a subset of those languages based on what is currently installed (including the languages that are supported by plugins).
I think we want to update the example plugin for SWL based on feedback from Galaxy, so I'm thinking we keep it.
A small nit. For readability this section could use String.format in addition to the append so that we can avoid lines that are just builder.append("\t").
